review: My family and I are always watching movies. We actually watch a lot of movies on our phones and tablets but can never watch them on TV till now. The Google Chrome cast is a wonderful addition to any techies hoard.This device comes with everything you need to get the chrome cast going so no need to buy anything extra. The instructions are clear and precise to get everything synced and going. The only flaw I found is that it can be a total pain in the butt to connect to the Wi-Fi at times. when I disconnected it and move it to a different TV it took us a half an hour to get it to reconnect.But overall I highly think this product is worth it. It's so much easier to watch your movies on the TV instead of fighting with your tablet.
